name: Sci-Fi Movies Quiz | Sci-Fi Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: According to J in 'Men in Black', what is the difference between him and K?
questions.explanation:
'I make this look good.'

	From 'Men in Black', as J puts on his sunglasses.

questions.text: What is the name of the alien race that tries to take over Earth in 'Star Trek: First Contact'?
questions.explanation:
The Borg.

	Resistance is futile. You will be assimilated.

questions.text: Who played Zephram Cochrane in 'Star Trek: First Contact'?
questions.explanation:
James Cromwell.

	Stewart played Captain Picard and Frakes played Riker. Hanks was originally considered for the role of Zephram Cochrane. He would've been good if you ask me.

Mark Hamill.

	I think most of us know what movie he's from...

questions.text: What is the last part of this well-known phrase: 'A long time ago in a galaxy...'?
options: At the edge of the universe
questions.explanation:
Far far away.

	The popular tagline to 'Star Wars' and its sequels.

questions.text: Which of the following actors was never in a 'Star Wars' film?
questions.explanation:
River Phoenix.

	Lloyd, McGregor, and Williams played young Anakin, young Obi-Wan, and Lando Calrissian, respectively.

questions.text: What movie features a virtual world, 'agents,' and a command to 'follow the white rabbit'?
questions.explanation:
The Matrix.

	An excellent movie with great effects.

questions.text: What character did Christopher Reeve play in the movie of the same name?
questions.explanation:
Superman.

	Christopher Reeve was paralyzed in a horse riding accident in 1995. The horse who threw him off was nicknamed Buck. Ironic, no? You know, if you think about it, 'super' is kind of a funny word.

questions.text: What is the name of the computer in '2001: A Space Odyssey'?
We all know the Terminator from 'The Terminator' and the actor who played him. But how on Earth do you spell his last name?
